problem_names:
lemma wf_J_mdecl[simp]:
  "wf_J_mdecl P C (M,Ts,T,pns,body) \<equiv>
  (length Ts = length pns \<and>
  distinct pns \<and>
  this \<notin> set pns \<and>
  (\<exists>T'. P,[this\<mapsto>Class C,pns[\<mapsto>]Ts] \<turnstile> body :: T' \<and> P \<turnstile> T' \<le> T) \<and>
  \<D> body \<lfloor>{this} \<union> set pns\<rfloor>)"

lemma wf_J_prog_wf_J_mdecl:
  "\<lbrakk> wf_J_prog P; (C, D, fds, mths) \<in> set P; jmdcl \<in> set mths \<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> wf_J_mdecl P C jmdcl"
lemma wf_mdecl_wwf_mdecl: "wf_J_mdecl P C Md \<Longrightarrow> wwf_J_mdecl P C Md"
translations:
lemma wf_J_mdecl[simp]:
  "wf_J_mdecl P C (M,Ts,T,pns,body) \<equiv>
  (length Ts = length pns \<and>
  distinct pns \<and>
  this \<notin> set pns \<and>
  (\<exists>T'. P,[this\<mapsto>Class C,pns[\<mapsto>]Ts] \<turnstile> body :: T' \<and> P \<turnstile> T' \<le> T) \<and>
  \<D> body \<lfloor>{this} \<union> set pns\<rfloor>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf_J_mdecl P C (M, Ts, T, pns, body) \<equiv>
    length Ts = length pns \<and>
    distinct pns \<and>
    this \<notin> set pns \<and>
    (\<exists>T'.
        P,[this \<mapsto> Class C, pns [\<mapsto>]
           Ts] \<turnstile> body :: T' \<and>
        P \<turnstile> T' \<le> T) \<and>
    \<D> body \<lfloor>{this} \<union> set pns\<rfloor>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf_J_mdecl P C (M, Ts, T, pns, body) \<equiv>
    length Ts = length pns \<and>
    distinct pns \<and>
    this \<notin> set pns \<and>
    (\<exists>T'.
        P,[this \<mapsto> Class C, pns [\<mapsto>]
           Ts] \<turnstile> body :: T' \<and>
        P \<turnstile> T' \<le> T) \<and>
    \<D> body \<lfloor>{this} \<union> set pns\<rfloor>
by(simp add:wf_J_mdecl_def)

abbreviation
  wf_J_prog :: "J_prog \<Rightarrow> bool" where
  "wf_J_prog == wf_prog wf_J_mdecl"

lemma wf_J_prog_wf_J_mdecl:
  "\<lbrakk> wf_J_prog P; (C, D, fds, mths) \<in> set P; jmdcl \<in> set mths \<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> wf_J_mdecl P C jmdcl"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>wf_J_prog P; (C, D, fds, mths) \<in> set P;
     jmdcl \<in> set mths\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> wf_J_mdecl P C jmdcl

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>wf_J_prog P; (C, D, fds, mths) \<in> set P;
     jmdcl \<in> set mths\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> wf_J_mdecl P C jmdcl
apply (simp add: wf_prog_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>wf_syscls P \<and>
             (\<forall>c\<in>set P. wf_cdecl wf_J_mdecl P c) \<and>
             distinct_fst P;
     (C, D, fds, mths) \<in> set P; jmdcl \<in> set mths\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> wf_J_mdecl P C jmdcl
apply (simp add: wf_cdecl_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>wf_syscls P \<and>
             (\<forall>c\<in>set P.
                 case c of
                 (C, D, fs, ms) \<Rightarrow>
                   (\<forall>f\<in>set fs. wf_fdecl P f) \<and>
                   distinct_fst fs \<and>
                   (\<forall>m\<in>set ms. wf_mdecl wf_J_mdecl P C m) \<and>
                   distinct_fst ms \<and>
                   (C \<noteq> Object \<longrightarrow>
                    is_class P D \<and>
                    (D, C) \<notin> (subcls1 P)\<^sup>* \<and>
                    (\<forall>x\<in>set ms.
                        case x of
                        (M, Ts, T, m) \<Rightarrow>
                          \<forall>D' Ts' T'.
                             (\<exists>a b.
                                 P \<turnstile> D sees M: Ts'\<rightarrow>T' = (a,
    b) in D') \<longrightarrow>
                             P \<turnstile> Ts' [\<le>] Ts \<and>
                             P \<turnstile> T \<le> T'))) \<and>
             distinct_fst P;
     (C, D, fds, mths) \<in> set P; jmdcl \<in> set mths\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> wf_J_mdecl P C jmdcl
apply (erule conjE)+

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>(C, D, fds, mths) \<in> set P; jmdcl \<in> set mths;
     wf_syscls P;
     \<forall>c\<in>set P.
        case c of
        (C, D, fs, ms) \<Rightarrow>
          (\<forall>f\<in>set fs. wf_fdecl P f) \<and>
          distinct_fst fs \<and>
          (\<forall>m\<in>set ms. wf_mdecl wf_J_mdecl P C m) \<and>
          distinct_fst ms \<and>
          (C \<noteq> Object \<longrightarrow>
           is_class P D \<and>
           (D, C) \<notin> (subcls1 P)\<^sup>* \<and>
           (\<forall>x\<in>set ms.
               case x of
               (M, Ts, T, m) \<Rightarrow>
                 \<forall>D' Ts' T'.
                    (\<exists>a b.
                        P \<turnstile> D sees M: Ts'\<rightarrow>T' = (a,
                                 b) in D') \<longrightarrow>
                    P \<turnstile> Ts' [\<le>] Ts \<and>
                    P \<turnstile> T \<le> T'));
     distinct_fst P\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> wf_J_mdecl P C jmdcl
apply (drule bspec, assumption)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>(C, D, fds, mths) \<in> set P; jmdcl \<in> set mths;
     wf_syscls P; distinct_fst P;
     case (C, D, fds, mths) of
     (C, D, fs, ms) \<Rightarrow>
       (\<forall>f\<in>set fs. wf_fdecl P f) \<and>
       distinct_fst fs \<and>
       (\<forall>m\<in>set ms. wf_mdecl wf_J_mdecl P C m) \<and>
       distinct_fst ms \<and>
       (C \<noteq> Object \<longrightarrow>
        is_class P D \<and>
        (D, C) \<notin> (subcls1 P)\<^sup>* \<and>
        (\<forall>x\<in>set ms.
            case x of
            (M, Ts, T, m) \<Rightarrow>
              \<forall>D' Ts' T'.
                 (\<exists>a b.
                     P \<turnstile> D sees M: Ts'\<rightarrow>T' = (a,
                              b) in D') \<longrightarrow>
                 P \<turnstile> Ts' [\<le>] Ts \<and>
                 P \<turnstile> T \<le> T'))\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> wf_J_mdecl P C jmdcl
apply simp

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>(C, D, fds, mths) \<in> set P; jmdcl \<in> set mths;
     wf_syscls P; distinct_fst P;
     (\<forall>x\<in>set fds. wf_fdecl P x) \<and>
     distinct_fst fds \<and>
     (\<forall>x\<in>set mths. wf_mdecl wf_J_mdecl P C x) \<and>
     distinct_fst mths \<and>
     (C \<noteq> Object \<longrightarrow>
      is_class P D \<and>
      (D, C) \<notin> (subcls1 P)\<^sup>* \<and>
      (\<forall>x\<in>set mths.
          case x of
          (M, Ts, T, m) \<Rightarrow>
            \<forall>D' Ts' T'.
               (\<exists>a b.
                   P \<turnstile> D sees M: Ts'\<rightarrow>T' = (a,
                            b) in D') \<longrightarrow>
               P \<turnstile> Ts' [\<le>] Ts \<and>
               P \<turnstile> T \<le> T'))\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> wf_J_mdecl P C jmdcl
apply (erule conjE)+

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>(C, D, fds, mths) \<in> set P; jmdcl \<in> set mths;
     wf_syscls P; distinct_fst P; \<forall>x\<in>set fds. wf_fdecl P x;
     distinct_fst fds; \<forall>x\<in>set mths. wf_mdecl wf_J_mdecl P C x;
     distinct_fst mths;
     C \<noteq> Object \<longrightarrow>
     is_class P D \<and>
     (D, C) \<notin> (subcls1 P)\<^sup>* \<and>
     (\<forall>x\<in>set mths.
         case x of
         (M, Ts, T, m) \<Rightarrow>
           \<forall>D' Ts' T'.
              (\<exists>a b.
                  P \<turnstile> D sees M: Ts'\<rightarrow>T' = (a,
                           b) in D') \<longrightarrow>
              P \<turnstile> Ts' [\<le>] Ts \<and>
              P \<turnstile> T \<le> T')\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> wf_J_mdecl P C jmdcl
apply (drule bspec, assumption)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>(C, D, fds, mths) \<in> set P; jmdcl \<in> set mths;
     wf_syscls P; distinct_fst P; \<forall>x\<in>set fds. wf_fdecl P x;
     distinct_fst fds; distinct_fst mths;
     C \<noteq> Object \<longrightarrow>
     is_class P D \<and>
     (D, C) \<notin> (subcls1 P)\<^sup>* \<and>
     (\<forall>x\<in>set mths.
         case x of
         (M, Ts, T, m) \<Rightarrow>
           \<forall>D' Ts' T'.
              (\<exists>a b.
                  P \<turnstile> D sees M: Ts'\<rightarrow>T' = (a,
                           b) in D') \<longrightarrow>
              P \<turnstile> Ts' [\<le>] Ts \<and>
              P \<turnstile> T \<le> T');
     wf_mdecl wf_J_mdecl P C jmdcl\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> wf_J_mdecl P C jmdcl
apply (simp add: wf_mdecl_def split_beta)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
lemma wf_mdecl_wwf_mdecl: "wf_J_mdecl P C Md \<Longrightarrow> wwf_J_mdecl P C Md"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf_J_mdecl P C Md \<Longrightarrow> wwf_J_mdecl P C Md

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf_J_mdecl P C Md \<Longrightarrow> wwf_J_mdecl P C Md
by(fastforce simp:wwf_J_mdecl_def dest!:WT_fv)
lemma wf_prog_wwf_prog: "wf_J_prog P \<Longrightarrow> wwf_J_prog P"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf_J_prog P \<Longrightarrow> wwf_J_prog P

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf_J_prog P \<Longrightarrow> wwf_J_prog P
apply(simp add:wf_prog_def wf_cdecl_def wf_mdecl_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf_syscls P \<and>
    (\<forall>c\<in>set P.
        case c of
        (C, D, fs, ms) \<Rightarrow>
          (\<forall>f\<in>set fs. wf_fdecl P f) \<and>
          distinct_fst fs \<and>
          (\<forall>m\<in>set ms.
              case m of
              (M, Ts, ab) \<Rightarrow>
                Ball (set Ts) (is_type P) \<and>
                (case ab of
                 (T, mb) \<Rightarrow>
                   is_type P T \<and> wf_J_mdecl P C (M, Ts, T, mb))) \<and>
          distinct_fst ms \<and>
          (C \<noteq> Object \<longrightarrow>
           is_class P D \<and>
           (D, C) \<notin> (subcls1 P)\<^sup>* \<and>
           (\<forall>x\<in>set ms.
               case x of
               (M, Ts, T, m) \<Rightarrow>
                 \<forall>D' Ts' T'.
                    (\<exists>a b.
                        P \<turnstile> D sees M: Ts'\<rightarrow>T' = (a,
                                 b) in D') \<longrightarrow>
                    P \<turnstile> Ts' [\<le>] Ts \<and>
                    P \<turnstile> T \<le> T'))) \<and>
    distinct_fst P \<Longrightarrow>
    \<forall>(C, D, fs, ms)\<in>set P.
       Ball (set fs) (wf_fdecl P) \<and>
       distinct_fst fs \<and>
       (\<forall>(M, Ts, ab)\<in>set ms.
           Ball (set Ts) (is_type P) \<and>
           (case ab of
            (T, mb) \<Rightarrow>
              is_type P T \<and> wwf_J_mdecl P C (M, Ts, T, mb))) \<and>
       distinct_fst ms \<and>
       (C \<noteq> Object \<longrightarrow>
        is_class P D \<and>
        (D, C) \<notin> (subcls1 P)\<^sup>* \<and>
        (\<forall>(M, Ts, T, m)\<in>set ms.
            \<forall>D' Ts' T'.
               (\<exists>a b.
                   P \<turnstile> D sees M: Ts'\<rightarrow>T' = (a,
                            b) in D') \<longrightarrow>
               P \<turnstile> Ts' [\<le>] Ts \<and>
               P \<turnstile> T \<le> T'))
apply(fast intro:wf_mdecl_wwf_mdecl)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
end
